<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_wsd_core_workplace_task_project</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_wsd_core_workplace_task_project">stateCHANGESTOclosed_complete^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Project changes to closed complete</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
if (new WPCoreUtils().checkIfAllCasesAreInactiveForProject(current.getUniqueValue())) { var msg = gs.getMessage('Cannot move the state to Closed complete as there are one or more active move cases associated with the project.'); gs.addErrorMessage(msg); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>vaibhavparashram.gan@snc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-22 07:26:37</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>078e5bc8478be55089f09e25126d434c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Project changes to closed complete</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_078e5bc8478be55089f09e25126d434c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-29 13:04:26</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=078e5bc8478be55089f09e25126d434c"/> </record_update>
